entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 21.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 50 %
Humidex: 23
Dewpoint: 10.5°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning early this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few rain showers and periods of wet snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
